HTML5 AUDIO PLAYER WITH PLAYLIST
http://codecanyon.net/item/html5-audio-player-with-playlist/1694831

<h2>Updates / Changelog</h2>

<p><strong>UPDATE 3.6 [27.9.2016]</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>[UPDATE] update compatibility with jquery 3</li>
</ul>

<h3>23.7.2016</h3>
version 3.5
<ul>
<li>some minor bug fixes</li>
<li>overall code improvements</li>
</ul>

<h3>22.6.2016</h3>
version 3.35
<ul>
<li>fixed seekbar/volume seek on touch devices</li>
</ul>

<h3>3.12.2015</h3>
version 3.30
<ul>
<li>updated podcast parsing</li>
</ul>

<h3>6.10.2015</h3>
version 3.25
<ul>
<li>html5 audio code is now hidden preventing users from downloading audio</li>
<li>fixed bug with ios 9 playback</li>
</ul>

<h3>6.7.2015</h3>
version 3.21
<ul>
<li>updated official.fm parsing</li>
</ul>

<h3>17.4.2015</h3>
version 3.2
<ul>
<li>update to Youtube api V3</li>
</ul>

<h3>12.2.2015</h3>
version 3.11
<ul>
<li>fixed bug with player seekbar and volume size on start</li>
</ul>

<h3>22.12.2014</h3>
version 3.1
<ul>
<li>fixed soundcloud favorites</li>
</ul>

<h3>2.5.2014</h3>
version 3.09
<ul>
<li>fixed email link to file download if file name contain spaces</li>
</ul>

<h3>13.3.2014</h3>
version 3.08
<ul>
<li>fixed id3 reader check on thumbnail</li>
</ul>

<h3>9.3.2014</h3>
version 3.07
<ul>
<li>updated youtube issue http://code.google.com/p/gdata-issues/issues/detail?id=5788</li>
</ul>

<h3>2.2.2014</h3>
version 3.06
<ul>
<li>fixed tooltip volume and seek offset</li>
<li>download now works with spaces in file names</li></ul>
</ul>

<h3>20.1.2014</h3>
version 3.05
<ul>
<li>removed onbeforeunload event popup html files</li>
</ul>

<h3>11.1.2014</h3>
version 3.04
<ul>
<li>fixed bug with autoOpenPlayerInPopup</li>
<li>fixed sortable scroll offset fix</li>
<li>added getid3 cache bust</li>
</ul>

<h3>21.12.2013</h3>
version 3.03
<ul>
<li>changed icon names/paths (download, trackUrlIcon, trackDownloadIcon)</li>
<li>fixed download in createTrackFromData</li>
<li>added option to sort files loaded from folder on title </li>
<li>new demo (index_playlist_selector_with_scroll.html) + updated jscroll pane container height settings when adding/removing tracks</li> 
<li>added option to parse id3 tags from mp3 files from folder</li>
</ul>

<h3>13.11.2013</h3>
version 3.01
<ul>
<li>cleaned/improved flash embedding code</li>
</ul>
